Services

The Coin-operated Washing Machine Top Loading / Front Loading. For Labor Camp Accommodations/Hotels/Hospitals/ Building Apartments. Top Loading Washing Machines come in 8 KG, 10 KG, 12 KG, and 15kg. Front Loading machines come in 7 KG, 10 KG, and 12 KG.

Services we offer

Coin-Operated Washing Machine Services in UAE

Welcome to Waseek Ahmad Air Conditioning and Mechanical Service Est! We are a dedicated team of professionals who specialize in providing top-quality coin-operated washing machines, laundry machines, top-load washing machines, and front-load washing machine services to residential, commercial, and industrial clients. With years of experience in the industry, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional customer service and reliable solutions that meet our clients’ needs.

Coin Operated Washing Machines

Laundry Machines

Top Loading Washing Machines

Supply and Installation Of Air Conditioners

Building Maintains and Facilities Management

HVAC Maintenance

You Can Trust Waseek Ahmad

We Will Be There To Help You In Whatever Way You Need

Waseek Ahmad Air Conditioning and Mechanical Service Est, are experts in fully automatic commercial washing machine & coin operated washing machines. We are devoted to providing technical and expert solutions for washing needs. Waseek Ahmad Air Conditioning and Mechanical Service always integrates its own understanding upon life and culture in washing machine into the designing of products, and continuously to create the technical, lead in designing and humanized products by employing the somatic anthropology, industrial arts, kinds of marginal science and integrated techniques, “Unique, quality, and leading” is the guiding principle and policy of Waseek Ahmad Air Conditioning and Mechanical Service.

We Provide Best Quality Service

We assure you that your every air conditioning needs will be catered to and resolved professionally in a timely fashion by our experts who are all HVAC-certified graduates.

What People & Clients Think About Us?

Michael Adam Happy Client

I am beyond impressed with the quality of work provided. From fixing my leaky faucet to repairing my drywall, everything was done with precision and care. They were very friendly and professional. I highly recommend them.

Jayden Smith Happy Client

I recently hired them to help with some home renovations, and I couldn't be happier with the results. They were knowledgeable, reliable, and efficient. I appreciated their attention to detail and commitment.
